276.sentence: It has very good range -- much better than the Linksys router it replaced .

277.sentence: It has a USB port -- so you can plug in a USB-powered drive and have network-accessible storage .

278.sentence: It seems that with every firmware release the router gets better & better .

279.sentence: It seems that with every firmware release the router gets better & better .

282.sentence: The price was the lowest I 'd seen in my research -LRB- Best Buy , Office Depot -RRB- .

283.sentence: Easy to use with clear instructions contained in the install drive .

284.sentence: Easy to use with clear instructions contained in the install drive .

285.sentence: Also has a nice guest feature so your visitors can connect separate of your primary link .

287.sentence: It 's a really nice looking device and can be positioned horizontally or vertically .

288.sentence: It 's a really nice looking device and can be positioned horizontally or vertically .

289.sentence: I give it a rating of 5 stars for looks .

290.sentence: I do n't think the external switch is much of a feature because in the end , you have to learn how to identify IP addresses , switch the router from from a dynamic to static IP address , and assign a static IP address that is compatible with your router or modem .

291.sentence: SETUP SOFTWARE - For my application , I found the setup software on the enclosed CD to be useless .

292.sentence: TECHNICAL SUPPORT LINE - The Buffalo Technical Support line on the other hand , was very helpful .

293.sentence: Be prepared for a long wait -LRB- 30-45 minutes -RRB- , but the wait was worth it .

294.sentence: The technical support phone line was responsible for my giving technical support 4 stars .

295.sentence: If I only considered the software or internet user manual I would have rated technical support as 2 or maybe 3 -LRB- at best -RRB- .

296.sentence: If I only considered the software or internet user manual I would have rated technical support as 2 or maybe 3 -LRB- at best -RRB- .

297.sentence: SUMMARY - I 'm happy to say that despite much frustration with setup , the Bufflo Nfinity G300N is working fantastic as a wireless access point with great range .

303.sentence: UPDATE Jan 12 , 2012 The device has worked flawlessly for the past year .

304.sentence: The device itself is pretty solid .

305.sentence: I only give it 4 stars because the device came with really old dd-wrt software .

306.sentence: The system was nowhere near stable , and the code was in `` alpha '' stage at best .
